meanings.meaning: The Heated Oxygen Sensor (2) located rear of catalytic converter produces an output signal relative to oxygen storage capacity of catalytic converter. Ho2S 2 signal is less active than signal produced by front oxygen sensor. This code sets when HO2 Sensor voltage is greater than 999 mV for more than 2 minutes (time depends on model. Could be as high as 4 minutes)

causes.cause: Short to battery voltage in O2 sensor signal circuit

descriptions.description: O2 Oxygen Sensor Circuit High Voltage (Bank1, Sensor2)

solutions.solution: Repair short to battery voltage in o2 sensor signal circuit

symptoms.symptom: There may be no noticeable symptoms except for MIL illumination. Possible high fuel pressure can over rich the system.
